title: Vintage Sears Logos
content:
I am in the midst of designing 2-10’ x 7’ murals for a new loft development.  
The loft development is inside a 1940s Sears retail store and I have been hired to design these 2 pieces.  
I want to pay homage to the era without over doing it and am curious if anyone can point me to some 1940 - 1960 Sears logos.  
I don’t plan to use the logos, but might create some graphic elements out of letterforms.

Thanks.

 [‹ CARTER, MATTHEW](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906165411/http:/www.typophile.com/node/11088 "Go to previous forum topic") [L & C Hairline typeface ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906165411/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42829 "Go to next forum topic")
author: mmsf

comments.content: I like how that link points back here.
